caption:

forms block-wise local RPGs.

caption:
Table 9: RPG model can be quantized with very tiny accu-
racy drop. With 8-bit quantization on ImageNet, ResNet18-
vanilla has an accuracy drop of 0.3 percentage point, while 
our ResNet18-RPG has an accuracy drop of 0.1 percentage 
point.
